snippet: The man, Daniel Patrick Sheehan, 50, laid out his demands in a pair of ransom letters and anonymous phone calls to company representatives last month.
abstract: Daniel Patrick Sheehan is charged in federal court for threatening to detonate pipe bombs in three Long Island Home Depot locations as part of a $2 million extortion plot; criminal complaint says Sheehan laid out his demands in ransom letters and anonymous phone calls to company representatives.
lead_paragraph: The man, Daniel Patrick Sheehan, 50, laid out his demands in a pair of ransom letters and anonymous phone calls to company representatives last month.

headline.seo: Man Is Charged in Bomb Plot at Long Island Home Depot
headline.main: Employee Charged in Plot to Bomb Home Depots
headline.print_headline: Home Depot Worker Is Charged in Plot to Bomb Stores
